timeline.bodyText: Why is the dependency on core removed?
timeline.author: eeatonaws

replies.bodyText:
It will be included transitively, since the other dependencies all require it.
I think the customer probably only wants to include the minimum set of dependencies. core is interesting in terms of our architecture, but regular users probably don't care a ton about the category/plugin discrepancy. They're just following the docs.
